column4: Q.  I'm trying to install Ubuntu and not having much luck.  When I get to the installation screen, I hit enter.  It shows 'loading vmlinux' and then maybe 'loading initrd', then my computer abruptly shuts off.
use acpi=off on the command line before hitting enter
I tried acpi=off, and the same problem occured.  Are there any other similar commands I can pass before installing?
